entries.title: Asus brings glasses-free 3D to OLED laptops
entries.description: High-specced workstations target professionals who want to work with 3D.

entries.title: Black man wrongfully jailed for a week after face recognition error, report says
entries.description: Lawyer says police didn't check man's height, weight—or the mole on his face.

entries.title: Abortion pills can now be sold at pharmacies, FDA rules
entries.description: Major retail chains still face logistical obstacles to selling abortion pills.

entries.title: Experiments with paper airplanes reveal surprisingly complex aerodynamics
entries.description: How these gliders keep level flight is different from the stability of airplanes.

entries.title: AMD says a “limited number” of 7900 XTX GPUs have a thermal throttling problem
entries.description: Owners of cards with throttling problems are encouraged to contact AMD support.

entries.title: Ars readers gave over $31,500 in our 2022 Charity Drive
Hundreds of WordPress sites infected by recently discovered backdoor
entries.description: People who use WordPress should check their sites for unpatched plugins.

entries.title: Roku introduces its own self-branded lineup of streaming-oriented TVs
entries.description: Relatively cheap sets won't compete with most existing RokuOS TVs.

entries.title: Intel’s new 13th-gen laptop CPUs are (very) mild year-over-year improvements
entries.description: Some CPUs get more cores, but we're mostly talking about clock-speed bumps.

entries.title: The OnePlus 11 launches in China with 100 W charging
entries.description: It has super-fast charging, a Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, and up to 16GB of RAM.

entries.title: Ford updates Mustang Mach-E UI; now you can turn a knob to change temps
entries.description: The software update adds new functions to the infotainment system's volume knob.

entries.title: Biden tries to end 2 years of deadlock at FCC by renominating Gigi Sohn
entries.description: Sohn renominated, has better chance now that Democrats have 51-49 Senate edge.

entries.title: Twitter lifts political ad ban designed to stop misinformation spread
entries.description: Twitter previously banned political ads starting in 2019.

entries.title: A new battery management system could boost EV range by 20 percent
entries.description: Texas Instruments' new battery monitor is designed to benefit LFP batteries.

entries.title: So long, Richard Shelby, and thanks for all the pork
entries.description: As Richard Shelby steps down, will Washington replace Alabama in prominence?

entries.title: Florida is fighting to feed starving manatees this winter
entries.description: Advocacy organizations believe the solution is less about lettuce—and more about leaders.

entries.title: How a vanished Ice Age lake shaped the past and present of Missoula, Montana
entries.description: The massive lake that fueled unimaginable floods refilled and emptied many times.

entries.title: Key Bitcoin developer calls on FBI to recover $3.6M in digital coin
entries.description: So much for enthusiasts championing the decentralization of cryptocurrencies.

entries.title: VW’s next electric car for the US is the ID.7 sedan
entries.description: VW says it has listened to feedback and has improved the user experience.
